titleStmt.title: Die Martis 28 Septemb. 1641 At the Committee appointed by the Commons House of Parliament to sit during the recesse. Commons house. By vertue of the order of the House of Commons; it is this day ordered by the said Committee, that the declaration of the house, made 9. Septemb. 1641. concerning innovations, ...
Proceedings. 1641-09-28.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
The Recess Committee of the Commons orders the Declaration of the House, 9 September, no. 1888, q.v., to be dispersed to every parish.
Headpiece; Steele notation: Commons; that certifi-.
Reproduction of the original in the Society of Antiquaries, London, England.
